docs.summary: An object for retrieving conversion rates and converting amounts.
description: Use the CurrencyConverter object to get the currency conversion rate for any pair of supported currencies. You can also convert an array of amounts from one currency to another.
The exchange rates are provided by [XE](https://www.xe.com/company/) on a daily basis and include the timestamp when they were set.

ret.doc: Fulfilled - The converted amounts and the timestamp for the conversion rate.

docs.summary: Converts an array of amounts from one currency to another.
description: Use the `convertAmounts()` function to convert an array of one or more amounts between two currencies.
The `convertAmounts()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a `ConvertedAmounts` object which contains an array of converted amounts and the timestamp for the conversion rate used.
The currency codes used must exist in the array returned by the

examples.title: Convert an array of amounts from one currency to another.

ret.doc:
Fulfilled - The conversion rate between the source and target currencies and 
the timestamp when the rate was set.

description: The `getConversionRate()` function returns a Promise that resolves to a `ConversionRate` object, which contains the currency conversion rate between two currencies. The exchange rates are provided by [XE](https://www.xe.com/company/) on a daily basis and include the timestamp when they were set.
> **Note:** By using this function you agree to XE's [Terms of Use.](https://www.xe.com/en/legal/dfs.php)

examples.title: Return the conversion rate and timestamp.

docs.summary: An object representing a currency conversion rate.

members.name: rate
members.doc: The conversion rate between the source and target currencies.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: The date and time when the rate was set.

docs.summary: An object representing the currencies and amounts to be converted.

members.name: from
members.doc: Currency to convert from.  The `from` currency code used must exist in the array returned by the [`getAllCurrencies()`](wix-pay-frontend.Currencies.html#getAllCurrencies) function.

members.name: to
members.doc:
Currency to convert to. The `to` currency code used must exist in the array returned by the [`getAllCurrencies()`](wix-pay-frontend.Currencies.html#getAllCurrencies) function.
> **Note:**
The `from` and `to` currency codes used must exist in the array returned by the 
[`getAllCurrencies()`](wix-pay-frontend.Currencies.html#getAllCurrencies) function.

docs.summary: An object representing the results of a currency conversion.

members.name: timestamp
members.doc: The date and time when the currency exchange rate was set.
